――と、これが指揮について俺が心がけている点だ。: That's what I'm trying to do about command.
ちょうどいいところで終わったな。\n以上で講義は終了だ。:
It ended at just the right time.
That was the end of the lecture.
（しかし、まさか……スポット的とはいえ、\n会長から特別講義を頼まれるなんてな）:
(Still, it can't be... It might be spot-on, but...)
I can't believe the chairman asked me to give a special lecture.)
（特別養成校舎……実力から性格まで様々な理由から、\n本来の所属校舎でチームに正:
(Special training school building... For various reasons, from her ability to her personality,
The kids who couldn't officially join the team in the original school building, huh...)
お、心香か。最後まで残ってどうしたんだ？\n講義のことで、何か質問でもあるのか？:
Oh, it's you, Kokoro. What's wrong with staying until the end?
Do you have any questions about the lecture?
似たような感じね。この後%usernameusernameuserna%に\n追:
Something like that. After this, I'll go to %usernameusernameuserna%.
I'd like to ask for an additional lecture.
マンツーマンで色々教えてもらいたいことがあって。: There's a lot I want you to teach me, one-on-one.
ええ、お願いできない？\n他に人がいないほうが集中できるから。:
Yes, can't you?
It's easier to concentrate when there's no one else around.
今日はもう遅い時間だし、\nさすがに今からは大変なんじゃないか？:
It's already late today,
Isn't it going to be tough from now on?
俺もこの後生徒会長に報告とかしないといけないし、\nそもそもあまり長く時間を取れ:
I'll have to report to the student council president after this, too.
I don't have much time in the first place.
そう……なら仕方ないわね。: I see... Then it can't be helped.
本当、真面目だよな、心香って。\nいいことだけど……ちょっと無理してないか？:
You really are serious, aren't you, Shinka?
It's a good thing, but... aren't you pushing yourself a little too hard?
無理？ これくらい、特別養成校舎にいるなら当然よ。\nむしろまだ足りないくらい。:
Impossible? This much is only natural if you're in the special training building.
In fact, it's still not enough.
そう……まだまだ足りないわ。\nもっと頑張らないと……:
I see... It's still not enough.
I need to work harder...
じゃないと、私もみんなもいつまで経っても、\nここから抜け出せない……:
Otherwise, no matter how much time passes, I and everyone else will...
I can't get out of here...
それじゃあ、失礼するわ。: Well then, if you'll excuse me.
ふぅ……まさかこの公園、スーパーへの\nショートカットになってるなんて盲点だった:
Phew... Don't tell me this park is for the supermarket?
It was a blind spot to think that it was a shortcut.
もっと散策したら、思わぬ発見があり――ん？: If you walk around more, you'll discover something unexpected— Hm?
心香……？\n暗い顔して、どうしたんだろう。:
Kokoro...?
What's wrong with her gloomy face?
よう、心香。浮かない顔して……恋人にでも振られたか？: Hey, Shinka. You look so glum... Did your lover dump you?
私が恋愛なんかにうつつを抜かすわけないでしょう。\n今までいたこともないわ。:
There's no way I'd be obsessed with love.
I've never been here before.
じゃあ、腹壊したけど、\nどこ行ってもトイレが埋まってて困ってるとか？:
Well, I got a stomachache, but...
Is there a problem with the toilet being filled everywhere?
残念ながら、それはできん。話してくれるまで付きまとうぞ。\n友達が暗い顔してるの:
Unfortunately, I can't do that. I'll follow you until you tell me.
There was no way she wouldn't be curious when her friend was looking gloomy.
……風紀委員会に通報するけど？: ...I'll report this to the disciplinary committee.
それは……ちょっと参ったな。\nそのときは弁護をお願いしていいか？:
That's... a bit of a problem.
If that happens, can I ask you to defend me?
……はぁ。この前、戦闘演習があったの。\nその時の成績が、ちょっと……:
*sigh* There was a combat exercise the other day.
My grades at the time were a little...
あまり良くなかった……か？: It wasn't very good... was it?
自信はあったのよ。貴方達のおかげで少し成長できたから……\nでもそれはマイナスが:
I was confident. Thanks to you, I was able to grow a little...
But that was only because the negatives had finally reached zero.
また次の機会に頑張れば……: If I do my best next time...
そういう言い訳でいつも誤魔化して、結局何も変わってないの。\nみんなこの特別養成:
That's the excuse I always use to hide it. In the end, nothing's changed.
No one's been able to get out of this special training building.
……私には、もうこれしかないのに。: ...This is all I can do now.
そうよ。スタートの掛け声、頼めるかしら？: That's right. Can you call for the start?
（素人目でもわかるほど、フォームが様になってる。\nきっと心香は――）:
(Even an amateur could tell how well her form looked.
I'm sure Kokoro will――)
まずいっ！ 転んで……！: This is bad! I'm going to fall...!
……はぁ、やっぱり、ダメね。: ...Haa, I knew it. It's no good.
大丈夫か、心香！ 怪我は！？: Are you all right, Shinka?! Are you hurt?!
問題ないわ、受け身を取ったから。\nこうなるって『わかってた』し。:
There's no problem. I took the fall.
I knew this would happen.
全力で走ると『こうなる』の。もう上手く走れない。\n昔は『将来を期待された有望選:
This is what happens when you run with all your might. You can't run well anymore.
In the past, they used to call me a promising player with high hopes for the future.
……以前は陸上競技の選手をしてたのよ。\n大会の成績も良かったし、周囲からも期待:
...I used to be a track and field athlete.
Her grades in the tournament were good, and the people around her were expecting great things from her.
私も内心将来トップアスリートになれる、って思い込んでたわ。\nまるで確定事項のよ:
On the inside, I thought I could become a top athlete in the future.
It's as if it's already been decided.
でも……大事な大会の数日前ってタイミングで、\n交通事故で怪我をしてしまって……:
But... just a few days before the important tournament...
I got hurt in a traffic accident...
日常生活を送れる程度には回復したけど、\n選手として復帰できる状態には戻れなかっ:
I've recovered enough to live my daily life, but...
I couldn't go back to being a player.
そのときは何もかもを呪ったわ。目に映るすべてが、憎かった。\n当時は毎日、恨むか:
I cursed everything then. I hated everything in my eyes.
At the time, all I did was hold a grudge or cry every day.
だけどね、あるとき転機が訪れたの。\n私にメイズ適性があることが発覚した。:
But one day, there was a turning point.
It was revealed that I had the aptitude for mace.
……私、思ったわ。\n『まだ、やれる』って。:
...I was thinking.
"I can still do it," she said.
陸上で果たせなかったトップアスリートの夢……\nその『代わり』を、この学園でなら:

I thought I might be able to fulfill that "replacement" at this school.
それで入学を決めて、今ここにいる。: That's why I decided to enroll here, and now I'm here.

私が特別養成校舎送りになった理由、貴方には話したっけ？: Did I tell you why I was sent to the special training building?
確か……『協調性の欠如』だったか。\nちゆる達から聞いたよ。:

I tried my best to do what I could.

When I was in the Hiiragi building...

……何が足りなかったのか、ダメだったのか。全然わからないの。: ...I don't know what I didn't have enough, or what I couldn't. I have no idea.

日常の生活習慣、栄養管理と食事制限について、\nそれから基礎練習……:
About daily life habits, nutrition management, and eating restrictions

みんなのモチベーションへの配慮だ。: It was out of consideration for everyone's motivation.

やる気なんかで、\n何かが左右されるようなことはあってはならないわ。:
She wasn't motivated at all

Why don't we have lunch together now?

I'm trying to balance the nutritional balance and calories of the food I eat every day

I avoid eating out in the first place.

ついでに言えば、俺の奢りだ。: While I'm at it, it's on me.
お、奢り……？ でもそういうのって高いんじゃ……: A-A treat...? But isn't that expensive...?
それを心香は今日タダで食えちゃうんだぞ。\n俺の気が変わらないうちに……どうだ？:
Koko can eat that for free today.

と、心香のお腹は申しておりますが？: Isn't that what Shinka's stomach says?

どういたしまして。\nこういう日も、悪くないだろ？:
You're welcome.

……まあ、そうね。あれだけしっかり\n食べてるところを見られちゃったら、否定でき:
...Yeah, you're right. She's so reliable.
If he sees me eating, I can't deny it.
最初は拒否してたのにな。: Even though I refused at first.
すっかり上手く乗せられてしまったかも。\nこれが『モチベーションへの配慮』ってこ:
I might have gotten carried away completely.
Is this what they call "consideration for motivation"?
そういうこった。\n結局のところ、人を動かすのは『やる気』だからな。:

それも自発的に湧くのを待つのではなく、\nましてや最初から持っていることに期待す:
That, too, wasn't to wait for it to spontaneously well up
Not to mention, it wasn't like I expected her to have it in the first place.
『やらせる』んじゃなくて『やろう、と思わせる』のが大事だ。\nどんなに合理的で正:
It's more important to "make her think, Let's do it" than "let her do it."
No matter how rational and correct it is, just pushing it on you won't solve anything.
あのマニュアルは悪いものじゃなかった。でも好き嫌いの激しい\nノエルに、食事内容:
Those manuals weren't bad. But they were picky.
I'm sure the restrictions on the contents of the meal will be severe for Noel.
内容が細かすぎてラウラは優先順位付けに迷いそうだし、\n難解な解説も多くてジュリ:
The content was so detailed that Laura felt like she was going to get lost in her priorities
There were so many difficult explanations that there was a concern that Julie would take some time to understand.
それらのハードルがあってなお『やろう』と思ってもらわないと、\n十全にはいかない:

相手の心を理解して、上手く導いてあげないとな。: I need to understand the other person's heart and guide them well.
そうね……でもどうすればいいの？\n貴方がさっき私にしたみたいに、器用にはできな:
That's true... But what should we do?

……ううん、ない。\nそんなのでいいの？:
...No, I don't.

正直、コミュニケーションにまだあまり自信はないけど……: Honestly, I still don't have much confidence in my communication skills...
でも夢を叶えたいなら、必要なことだ。\nそうだろ？:
But if you want to make your dream come true, it's necessary.

心香になら乗り越えられるさ、この試練。\n俺が保証する。:
Kokoro can overcome this trial.
I can guarantee it.
……ふふ、なるほど。%usernameusernameuserna%は普段、\n:
...Hehe, I see. %usernameusernameuserna% usually...

なんでもないわ。%usernameusernameuserna%には、\n見習う:
It's nothing. To %usernameusernameuserna%,

これからも、勉強させてもらうわね。: I'll be studying from now on, too.
私、やるとなったら徹底的にやるタイプなの。\n覚悟しておいて。:
I'm the type to do things thoroughly when they need to be done.

ああ、頑張れ。いつだって俺が味方になるからな。: Yeah, good luck. I'll always be on your side.
